nodes.message: NOTE: The script for the first conversation with Aeolus is stored on Day1_Intro storyEvent
Aeolus is still at the Poobah game.
Both of these cases are handled above. Aeolus Gone = Neat bed, Aeolus Sleeping = Sleeping Bed
Clean case here (instead of above) so we can handle the non-clean bed more easily.
It's night. Turning on the bedroom night version.
It's day. Turning on the bedroom day version.
Letters do not appear until after dinner.
